New Records: Giancarlo Stanton hit a go-ahead homer in the eighth inning
Key Match Events: Giancarlo Stanton finished with three hits, drove in two runs and stole a base for the first time in four years for the Yankees
Bobby Witt Jr.'s first hit of the series
Yuli Gurriel handled the ninth to earn the save and cap 4 1/3 scoreless innings by the New York bullpen
Pre-Game Insights: The manager emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
The Yankees had some good swings against Seth Lugo's dizzying array of nine pitches, but they had nothing to show for it early on
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed frustration in the postseason for MVP front-runner Aaron Judge
The Royals won their first playoff game at the K in 3,268 days, since the Royals beat the Mets in Game 2 of the 2015 World Series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Kauffman Stadium, which had its first playoff game in 3,268 days
The Yankees drew nine walks Wednesday night, giving them 22 for the series
Others: The Royals used four relievers before Kris Bubic took over for the eighth
The Yankees will turn to six-time All-Star pitcher Gerrit Cole on Thursday night with a chance to reach the American League Championship Series
